Cheesecake

Back to Home

Ingredients

  • 200g digestive biscuits (crushed)
  • 100g butter (melted)
  • 600g cream cheese
  • 150g sugar
  • 3 eggs
  • 1 tsp vanilla extract
  • 150ml sour cream

Instructions

  1. Mix crushed biscuits with melted butter and press into a springform pan.
  2. Beat cream cheese and sugar until smooth.
  3. Add eggs one at a time, then vanilla and sour cream, mix well.
  4. Pour mixture over crust and bake at 160°C (320°F) for 50-60 minutes.
  5. Let cool and refrigerate at least 4 hours before serving.
